the history of theoretical computer science in 1985 he received the touring award for his
research in the theory of algorithms including the development of the admirance carp algorithm
for solving the max flow problem on networks hopcroft corp algorithm for finding
maximum cardinality matchings in bipartite graphs and his landmark paper and complexity theory
called reducibility among combinatorial problems in which he proved
21 problems to be np complete this paper was probably the most important catalyst in the explosion of
interest in the study of np completeness and the p versus np problem in general
